abstract: Cardinal Timothy M Dolan and several lawmakers call for ban on scalping for nonprofit events after tickets distributed to New York City residents through city-sponsored lottery to procession by Pope Francis appear for sale on websites like Craigslist and eBay.
lead_paragraph: Joining Cardinal Timothy M. Dolan in chastising profiteers, two state lawmakers urged their colleagues to ban scalping for nonprofit events.

headline.main: Cardinal Dolan Condemns Scalping of Pope Procession Tickets
headline.print_headline: Dolan Condemns Scalping of Tickets for Pope’s Procession in City

snippet: Joining Cardinal Timothy M. Dolan in chastising profiteers, two state lawmakers urged their colleagues to ban scalping for nonprofit events.
